Milestones
==========
* **Submit the first version of  SRS** - May 1st
* **Design pages for the website** - May 6th
* **Complete the SRS for the first release** - May 8th
* **Carry out an algorithm** - May 12th
* **Test the algorithm** - May 14th
* **Merge the pages with the algorithm** - May 20th
* **Page test** - May 22th
* **Bug fix** - May 30th
* **Release the first version** - May 31th
* **Test with real data** - June 1st
* **Deploy on a server** - June 15th
